short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic tool for SEO on-page analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Simple SEO Tool" is a minimalistic extension that simplifies SEO on-page analysis and optimization processes. 

In version 2 of the extension, many old features were removed, and it was aligned with up-to-date Google Chrome policies.

With a user-friendly interface and minimalistic design, it helps SEO practitioners in their daily work.

Key features and functionalities include:
- Indexing status: Quickly determine whether a page is open or closed for indexing by search engines.
- Metadata verification: Verify crucial metadata elements such as title, description, canonical URL, and H1 tags;
- Microformats and page speed: Perform quick assessments of microformats implementation and page loading speed.
- External links analysis: Check if a page has external links;
- Headings structure: Analyze the structure and organization of page titles to ensure maximum effectiveness of H1-H6.
- Hreflang: Check for hreflang attributes for multi-language and regional content optimization.
- Pagination: Check for marking with prev/next.

This tool lets you check and improve your pages quickly and drive organic traffic.
